rules.natural: If lab1 develops a cure for disease1, then substance1 cures disease1.
Either lab1 develops a cure for disease1 or lab1 researches disease1.
Provided that lab1 submits a manuscript on disease1, lab1 receives reviews on disease1.
Under the condition that lab1 receives reviews on disease1, lab1 revises the manuscript on disease1.
Whenever lab1 revises the manuscript on disease1, lab1 obtains a patent for disease1.
Under the condition that lab1 researches disease1, lab1 synthesizes substance1.
If substance1 treats disease1, then substance1 cures disease1.
Either lab1 publishes findings on disease1 or, if lab1 has equipment for substance1, then the synthesis of substance1 by lab1 results in substance1 treating disease1.
If lab1 obtains a patent for disease1, then lab1 does not publish findings on disease1.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(researches(disease1, lab1) -> treats(disease1, substance1)) -> halts_research(disease1, lab1)) -> loses_funding(disease1, lab1))
rules.natural: If it is not the case that the failure of lab1 researching disease1 to imply substance1 treating disease1 leads to lab1 halting research on disease1, then lab1 loses funding for disease1.

facts.natural: Lab1 submits a manuscript on disease1.
Lab1 does not halt research on disease1.
Lab1 does not lose funding for disease1.

steps.natural: If it is not the case that lab1 researching disease1 implies substance1 treating disease1, then lab1 halts research on disease1.
If lab1 researches disease1, then substance1 treats disease1.
Provided that lab1 researches disease1, substance1 cures disease1.

Lab1 obtains a patent for disease1.
Lab1 does not publish findings on disease1.
If lab1 has equipment for substance1, then the synthesis of substance1 by lab1 leads to substance1 treating disease1.
Provided that lab1 synthesizes substance1, substance1 treats disease1.
If lab1 researches disease1, then substance1 treats disease1.
Provided that lab1 researches disease1, substance1 cures disease1.

(A1 → G).natural: If lab1 develops a cure for disease1, then substance1 cures disease1.

(A1 ∨ A2).natural: Either lab1 develops a cure for disease1 or lab1 researches disease1.

(A10 → A11).natural: Provided that lab1 submits a manuscript on disease1, lab1 receives reviews on disease1.

(A10 → A9).natural: Whenever lab1 submits a manuscript on disease1, lab1 obtains a patent for disease1.

(A11 → A12).natural: Under the condition that lab1 receives reviews on disease1, lab1 revises the manuscript on disease1.

(A11 → A9).natural: If lab1 receives reviews on disease1, then lab1 obtains a patent for disease1.

(A12 → A9).natural: Whenever lab1 revises the manuscript on disease1, lab1 obtains a patent for disease1.

(A2 → A3).natural: If lab1 researches disease1, then substance1 treats disease1.

(A2 → A6).natural: Under the condition that lab1 researches disease1, lab1 synthesizes substance1.

(A2 → G).natural: Provided that lab1 researches disease1, substance1 cures disease1.

(A3 → G).natural: If substance1 treats disease1, then substance1 cures disease1.

(A6 → A3).natural: Provided that lab1 synthesizes substance1, substance1 treats disease1.

(A7 → (A6 → A3)).natural: If lab1 has equipment for substance1, then the synthesis of substance1 by lab1 leads to substance1 treating disease1.

(A8 ∨ (A7 → (A6 → A3))).natural: Either lab1 publishes findings on disease1 or, if lab1 has equipment for substance1, then the synthesis of substance1 by lab1 results in substance1 treating disease1.

(A9 → ¬A8).natural: If lab1 obtains a patent for disease1, then lab1 does not publish findings on disease1.

(¬(A2 → A3) → A4).natural: If it is not the case that lab1 researching disease1 implies substance1 treating disease1, then lab1 halts research on disease1.

(¬(¬(A2 → A3) → A4) → A5).prover9_expression: (-(-(researches(disease1, lab1) -> treats(disease1, substance1)) -> halts_research(disease1, lab1)) -> loses_funding(disease1, lab1))
(¬(¬(A2 → A3) → A4) → A5).natural: If it is not the case that the failure of lab1 researching disease1 to imply substance1 treating disease1 leads to lab1 halting research on disease1, then lab1 loses funding for disease1.
